text: Transform a flat list to nested List
Rules: Go through each item in the list.
If we hit a 2 followed by a 1 created a list and include that 1 in that list until we hit a 3, include that 3, then close the list and continue.
It's like if 1 was 3 were parenthesis.
I'm not very good with recursive algorithms which I think might be needed in this case.
